articles.author: Amanda Silberling
articles.title: Reddit is testing verification badges - TechCrunch
articles.description: Verified users will actually be notable figures, not just people who paid for the checkmark.
articles.content:
Reddit is starting a limited test of verified profiles, which places a grey checkmark beside the username of a notable person or business.

articles.title: Dark Chocolate Compound Linked To Slower Aging - SciTechDaily
